text: Question 40 i -0.66 MARKS Your Time Taken: 4m 43s Avg Time Taken By Others: Im15s Attempt Accuracy: 27% DMA Transfer Modes Consider 16 KBps IO device interfaced to 64-bit CPU using DMA interface in cycle-stealing mode. DMA contains 4-bit count register. Machine-cycle is 2 ms. What are the percentages of block time and busy time of CPU respectively?
